title: Red
description: Red hails from an abusive home, and when an escape in the form of a cult of young witches arises, she takes it. In a town where witchcraft is forbidden and punishable by death, she finds the thrill exciting. But when she discovers that her father plans to sacrifice her to the wolf that lurks in the forest beyond the town line, Red takes matters into her own hands.
author: Sabrina
